title: Science Education Innovation Design through Large-Scale Online Course (MOOC) Teaching Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course analyzing MOOC teaching experiences in BYOD environments and applying them to science education. Participants develop instructional design capabilities based on actual MOOC operation cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core elements of MOOC instructional design (motivation, experience management, quality assessment)
Learners can develop a research design analyzing MOOC educational effectiveness using mixed methods (quantitative + qualitative)
Design and implement one PBL project applicable to science MOOCs
Propose strategies to address key challenges in large-scale online learning environments (e.g., declining engagement, limitations in feedback)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
